text: Cesidio Guazzaroni (5 January 1911 in Loreto Aprutino – 2 October 2004 in Rome) was an Italian diplomat who served as a European Commissioner from 1976 to 1977. When Altiero Spinelli resigned from the Ortoli Commission in 1976, Guazzaroni was appointed to replace him as Commissioner for Industry and Technology. He held office from 1976 to 6 January 1977. He later served as the Italian ambassador to Switzerland. == References == Category:1911 births Category:2004 deaths Category:Ambassadors of Italy to Switzerland Category:Italian European Commissioners Category:European Commissioners 1973–1977 Category:People from the Province of Pescara
